title: Save 55% on photo books, cards and prints from the excellent Mixbook now
author: georgia-silcox
summary: Save big on photo books, cards, calendars and more
article: Mixbook’s high-quality products are easy to create and some of our favorite products of any photo printing service on the market. For the best photo books, cards, calendars and prints, Mixbook has it all - and for a short time they're even more affordable.

To celebrate its 15th birthday, Mixbook has massive discounts across the whole website. All you need to do is browse the Mixbook website, add the products that you want to your basket, and head to the checkout. Once you’re there add the code CELEBRATE and save on every single item.

If your order comes to over $115, the total of your basket will be halved - a huge 50% saving. Only looking to pick up a few items? You'll still save 40% on any orders below the $115 mark. And the best bit is that the biggest savings are on the most luxurious products - you can get 55% off premium, luxe, and, cotton photo cards, and many more premium products too.
So whichever product you want from our favorite photo book service, make sure you use the code CELEBRATE at checkout before it expires on August 25.

We've tried and tested the best photo book companies out there and Mixbook is our favorite. There are dozens of high quality products to pick from that are easy to create and super customizable. You can pick from 500 themes including family, wedding and everyday - Mixbook has got you covered.

When creating your own personal photo book you can pick a soft, glossy, matte or leather cover, and for the paper go for a semi-gloss or premium matte finish. The options don't end there, whether you want a landscape, square or portrait format, Mixbook has them all.

headers.4: Is Mixbook a good photo book service to use?
headers.6: Which products are 55% off at Mixbook?
